problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠ACB = N_0, ∠A = N_1, AB = N_2, then the value of AC•BC is ()
raw_answer:
解:
解法一:∵sin30°=2sin15°\cos15°=\frac{1}{2},∠A=15°,∴2×\frac{BC}{AB}×\frac{AC}{AB}=\frac{1}{2}；
又∵AB=8,∴AC•BC=16．
解法二:
作△ABC的中线CD,过C作CE⊥AB于E,∵∠ACB=90°,∴AD=DC=DB=\frac{1}{2}AB=4,∴∠A=∠ACD=15°,∴∠CDB=∠A+∠ACD=30°,∴CE=\frac{1}{2}CD=2,∴S△ABC=AC•BC=\frac{1}{2}AB•CE,即\frac{1}{2}AC•BC=\frac{1}{2}×8×2,∴AC•BC=16
故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题考查了锐角三角函数的定义．解答该题的关键是熟记二倍角公式．
